name: Social Media Meta Tags
author: Bassem Rabia

sections.description:
The Social Media Meta Tags, are HTML tags that allow you to make the most out of the content you share from your site. You can determine what information is displayed in the post on Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest and beyond. If your posts, tweets and pins show the right informations, they are much more likely to get more engagements and re-shares.

Social Media Meta Tags will help your SEO by helping search engines better display your site’s rich content.
sections.installation:
• In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  • Search for Social Media Meta Tags
  • Click to install
  • Activate the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.8

  • Code refactoring
  • WP 4.7.5 compatibility
  • Change the plugin name

1.7.2

  • Code refactoring

1.7.1

  • New interface into post edit page for better user experience
  • WP 4.7.3 compatibility
  • Fixed known bugs
  • And more can be discovered by you.

1.7

  • WP 4.7 compatibility

1.6

  • WP 4.6 compatibility

1.5

  • Enable – disable share buttons into post page

1.4

  • Adding share link to posts

1.3.1

  • OOP structure
  • A default picture will be set in case there is no defined thumbnail.

1.3

  • WP 4.5.3 compatibility
  • Minor bug fixes

1.2

  • Minor bug fixes
  • Google+

1.1

  • Minor bug fixes

1.0

  • The first version
